alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 24 at 2:14PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Clear Boggy Creek near Caney affecting Atoka County.
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC005-250715- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.Y.0007.230324T1914Z-230326T1800Z/ /CANO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 214 PM CDT Fri Mar 24 2023 ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Clear Boggy Creek near Caney. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, The creek remains within its banks in western Atoka County and the northeastern edge of Bryan County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The Clear Boggy Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 23.2 feet tomorrow evening. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
